title: Alphabet sells bonds worth $20 billion to fund AI spending
description: Alphabet has sold bonds worth $20 billion in a seven-part offering stretching out to 2066, tapping the debt market to fund its surging spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
The disclosure on Tuesday underscored Big Tech's growing appetite for credit, in a shift away from years of relying on strong cash flows to fund investment in new technologies.

title: Want to get rich using AI? Billionaire Mark Cuban believes it could produce world’s first trillionaire. Here's how he uses AI
description: Mark Cuban believes artificial intelligence is still in its early stages and could unlock massive wealth for individuals, possibly even creating the worlds first trillionaire. The billionaire investor says AI lowers barriers in a way earlier technologies did not, meaning a single person working alone could build something enormously valuable. While Cuban uses AI daily to improve productivity and manage his health, he also warns that the technology has limits and must be questioned.

title: BRICS crucial for building greater Eurasian partnership, says Russian FM Lavrov
description: Lavrov highlighted India's focus on food and energy security, as well as digital and ICT safeguards. He welcomed India's initiative to host an upcoming artificial intelligence summit, emphasising the need to establish international norms for AI, particularly in security and military contexts. While transparency is necessary, BRICS nations will resist any curbs on their sovereignty.

title: What to know about Elon Musk's merger of SpaceX with his AI company
description: The merger of SpaceX and xAi will finance Elon Musk's artificial intelligence ambitions, including a futuristic plan to blast a million satellite data centers into orbit.
content:
Elon Musk recently announced what seemed like an odd pairing of his companies: SpaceX was acquiring xAI, the artificial intelligence firm that also owns the social media platform X.

title: India 'AI Impact Summit 2026' To Focus On Democratisation Of AI
description: India will host the AI Impact Summit 2026 from February 16–20 in New Delhi, focusing on democratising artificial intelligence. The summit will bring global leaders together to promote affordable, inclusive and trustworthy AI, with special emphasis on Global South needs, equitable access, and sustainable development through the IndiaAI Mission.
content:
New Delhi: As India gets prepared to host the mega ‘AI Impact Summit 2026’, the country’s approach to the democratisation of AI shows that scale, inclusion and innovation can progress together, an official statement said on Tuesday.

title: Doctors warn against dangers of misinformation from AI
description: The Canadian Medical Association says doctors are worried that more of their patients are turning to artificial intelligence for health advice — and getting answers that put them in danger.
content:
